sentences.en: ...an effort to control toxic algae in Green Lake.
sentences.cn: …控制绿湖里有毒水藻的努力。

sentences.en: Agar is complex polysaccharide, extracted from red algae.
sentences.cn: 琼脂是一种从红藻中提取的复杂的多糖.

sentences.en: Algae grow and spread quickly in the lake.
Among the blue - green algae are many species of nitrogen fixation.
sentences.cn: 许多种蓝藻有固氮的能力.

sentences.en: And then there is algae. Its oil can be used for fuel.
sentences.cn: 另外还有水藻, 它的油质可以用做燃料.

sentences.en: Any of the Brown algae that make up the genus Sargassum.
sentences.cn: 马尾藻类海草家族的任何一种褐色海藻.

sentences.en: It has been applied to attached algae and submerged vascular plants.
sentences.cn: 这已经用于附生藻类和沉水维管束植物中.

sentences.en: Lichen is a form in which green or bluegreen algae and a fungus live together symbiotically.
sentences.cn: 地衣是一种绿藻或蓝藻与一种真菌共生的形式.

sentences.en: Schroeder was apparently the first to offer some information about the benthic algae.
sentences.cn: 显然是Schroeder首先提出了有关海底藻类的资料.

sentences.en: The algae take much of the oxygen from the water.
sentences.cn: 藻类从水中带走了大量的氧气.

sentences.en: The green covering on top of the water in the pond is algae.
sentences.cn: 池塘水面上绿色的东西是水藻.

sentences.en: The growth of aquatic plants like algae is hastened, and fish reproduction may be disrupted.
sentences.cn: 促进了水生植物如藻类的生长, 可能毁坏鱼类的繁殖.

sentences.en: The most effective new botanicals are extracts from cola nut and marine algae.
sentences.cn: 这种极其有效的新型植物制剂是从可乐果和海藻中提炼出来的。

sentences.en: The only plants to be found in Antarctica are algae, mosses, and lichens.
sentences.cn: 在南极洲所发现的植物只有藻类 、 苔藓和地衣.

sentences.en: Wild plants in the seed plants, ferns, moss and algae.
sentences.cn: 境内野生植物有种子植物 、 蕨类植物 、 苔藓类和藻类植物.

trans.tran_en: a very simple plant without stems or leaves that grows in or near water
